in latest source things compile but give functionally the wrong results. 1. the alignment is wrong (32 byte vs 64 byte) if you whack that out of the way you hit 2) you get numerically the wrong results

body:
in latest source things compile but give functionally the wrong results.
1. the alignment is wrong (32 byte vs 64 byte)
if you whack that out of the way you hit
2) you get numerically the wrong results
